attributes.action: join a gym and go at least as many times a week as he expects the genra public to go
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if the pm wants be a leader he should set the example to the nation. if he expects the nation to go to the gym he should go aswell.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
